Html:
Does anyone know if there's ever going to be a logarithmic axis? Or, of a way to get a chart to display in a logarithmic scale while keeping the correct values in the axis.

I'm dealing with some charts where the difference in values can be very large making the smaller impossible to see. I know how to pass the values through a logarithmic converter first, but that will cause the labeling in the Y-Axis to be off.
